properties.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 1 at 11:22AM MST until March 2 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, briefly heavy at times, expected. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts.

* WHERE...El Paso County.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 7 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and icy road conditions with
significantly reduced visibility at times. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavier bands of snow are expected at times
tonight, which may produce highly varying snow amounts and road
conditions. Patchy blowing snow will also be possible.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM MST MONDAY
